title: PB Partner Hub logo static asset + consistent usage

requirements.summary: Add a generated transparent 200x200 PB Partner Hub logo PNG as a static asset at the exact filename already referenced by the UI.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/public/assets/generated/pb-partner-hub-logo-transparent.dim_200x200.png` exists and is a 200x200 transparent PNG.
The existing Header and Footer logo renders without broken images and remains crisp at 40x40 display size.

file_operations.description: Create the square 200x200 transparent PNG brand logo for PB Partner Hub (letters 'PB', clean professional insurance/partner-hub feel) at this exact path/filename so existing UI references load correctly.

requirements.summary: Ensure the logo is served as a frontend static file and used consistently anywhere the site logo appears (Header/Footer).
acceptanceCriteria: No backend endpoints or blob storage are used to fetch the logo.
Header and Footer both load the logo from `/assets/generated/pb-partner-hub-logo-transparent.dim_200x200.png`.

file_operations.description: Add a single shared constant (e.g., exported logo asset path string) for the PB Partner Hub logo pointing to `/assets/generated/pb-partner-hub-logo-transparent.dim_200x200.png` to ensure consistent usage across the app.
Update the header logo image source to reference the shared brand logo constant so the logo is consistently loaded as a frontend static file (not via backend) and remains crisp at 40x40.
Update the footer logo image source to reference the shared brand logo constant so the logo is consistently loaded as a frontend static file (not via backend) and matches the header.
